name: Super Spook
description:
Play This Innovative and Difficult Platformer where you can control the platforms.

Do you have what it takes to beat the levels?

This is My Team and I's first-ever game, developed over 3 months. play as both Spook and Lilly, a ghost who helps adventurers survive the dangerous enchanted forest, and Lilly an adventurer trying to escape it. (we do not own any of the sounds in the game).

Like\Love the Game? want to help with the Production? send me a message, maybe we can collaborate :)
